An introduction to digital media.

Dynamic Designs with jQuery 3 hours

Learn how to add a slideshow and a pop-up image gallery to your website using jQuery plugins.
Building the Web 6 hours

Create programmable circuits using the SparkFun Inventors kit and the NodeRed drag-and-drop programming interface.
